version_description:
- New shops and memberships features for businesses
- New delivery options

- Use your current location to post and find ads near you!
- See and filter on ads posted by our verified members
- See more similar ads from a specific member on each of their ad pages
- Link to a member's page from their ad to get details about their business, opening hours, address and more!
- Bug fixes: visual bugs

- Introducing Buy Now on ikman: get items delivered to your doorstep for free!
- To use Buy Now, just go to an ad marked as Buy Now, press the "Buy Now" button at the bottom, fill out the form and we'll contact you to arrange delivery
- Buttons to Buy Now and contact seller are now always accessible, at the bottom of each ad
- Bug fixes: app crash when posting ad.

- Get notifications when your ad goes live or needs to be updated
- Friendly reminders to keep your ad up-to-date and relevant so you can sell faster!
- Bug fixes for app crashes

- Bug fixes for push notifications
- Support for push notifications removed from older versions of the app

- Introduction of contextually relevant push notifications
- Enhancements to guided flow for push notification permissions
- Bug fixes and minor UI improvements

- Sign up and log in with your Facebook account!
- Verify your phone number and order items through Buy Now for fast delivery to your doorstep!
- Easy-to-access contact buttons on our seller's Shop pages
- Updated safety information
- Bug fixes

- A new category for Work Overseas, separate from Jobs in Sri Lanka
- A cleaner business page for Job agencies to display their job listings
- App crash and other bugfixes
Bug fixes and general improvements
Bug fixes and general improvements

- Updated post ad form, including better error messages and updated fields
- View deadlines for jobs postings
- View posted ad count on posting flow (Members only)
- Bugfixes for category and location errors
Bug fixes and general improvements
- General improvements and compatibility fixes
- General improvements and compatibility fixes
Bug fixes and general improvements

- Members can now post ads that do not expire.
- All new jobs experience
- New job details view with more details
- My resume" within "User Profile" with hand holding for creating a new resume
- Build your resume as you apply for jobs

- Added Property business pages
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Bug fixes

We update ikman app regularly to improve your experience. Download the latest version for all updated features.
This version includes:
- Members can now post Buy Now ads by using the Opt-in feature on post-ad
- Added comma separators for price field on post/edit ad
- Facebook SDK has been updated to the latest version
- Added Genie pay on payment screens
- Minor bug fixes and enhancements

- You can now *Promote ad* from post-ad confirmation screen
- Auto-fill OTP on post-ad and Buy Now forms
- Minor bug fixes and enhancements
Bug fixes and improvements

- We now have a new icon for Ikman on iOS.
- Chat directly with the sellers on iOS app
- Access deals shops from menu bar.

- Listing fee payments made much easier with payment integration. Ad posters can now pay online on the post ad confirmation screen.
- Fixed few bugs and made minor enhancements.
- Bug fixes and improvements

- Support for iPhone X and newer devices
- Filter and order your favourite products using BuyNow
- Job seekers can now attach a CV while applying for a Job
- Bug Fixes and Enhancements

- You can now *Promote ad* from post-ad confirmation screen
- Auto-fill OTP on post-ad and Buy Now forms
- Minor bug fixes and enhancements

- Increase your ads visibility by using the newly added “Promote ad” button
- “My ads” section now has the list of ads which needs listing fees.
- Upload multiple images on post-ad flow in a single go.
- Minor bug fixes and enhancements.

- Fixed a bug which was making images uploaded blurry
- Added new member badges
- Members users can now add more than 5 images while posting ads

We update ikman app regularly to improve your experience. Download the latest version for all updated features.
This version includes:

- Added comma separators for price field on post/edit ad

We update ikman app regularly to improve your experience. Download the latest version for all updated features.
This version includes:
- A new design to improve navigation and discovery of the categories.
- Bug fixes and enhancements

We update ikman app regularly to improve your experience. Download the latest version for all updated features.
This version includes:
- Provide an enhanced and stable chat solution
- Enable a chat user to block another chat user from "My Chats" screen
- Enable a chat user to delete conversations from "My Chats" screen
- Bug fixes and enhancements

We update ikman app regularly to improve your experience. Download the latest version for all updated features.
This version includes:
- Disable Dark mode for the app. We will come back with a solution at a later point of time.
- Bug fixes and enhancements
